price: Has the revelation been sent down upon him out of all of us? Rather, he is an insolent liar.”
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
